short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add notes to web pages and access them from the sidebar when you revisit.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension helps you add notes to a webpage. You can click on the extension icon and open sidebar. In the sidebar you will see sections for Page, Site and All. You can add notes for page in Page section. Add notes to be visible throughout the site in Site section. And if you want to keep notes that are shown on all the pages, add them to All section.

* Add notes for a web page, for entire website or to see it on all the pages
* Notes are shown in chrome sidebar
* Badge is shown to highlight if there is a note present for the page you are visiting. To make sure you see a badge, please pin the extension
